div.p: Please see the attached letter from Superintendent Dale Heidbreder with an update on Remote Learning Days. This letter includes a list of frequently asked questions and...

img.alt: Lunch Sign-Up for Week of April 27

a.span: Lunch Sign-Up for Week of April 27

div.p: Central District 51 will continue to provide lunches for Central students and their siblings one year-old or older who are in need. Lunch pick-up for CPS and CIS families...
We have had some of our parents reaching out to make sure our neediest students are being taken care of over the time off. We are thankful for the very generous donations...

1st grade students Aarush G. and Daniel B. went above and beyond for Mrs. Davidshofer! They completed informational reading, created a web, and even wrote a paragraph about a spring “critter” of their choice. ✏️📓💙 view image

CIS Stay Home Spirit Week pictures! 📸
Keep them coming! 💙
#celebratecentral51 #spiritday #wemissyou view image

CPS and CIS:
Even though we are stuck at home, Student Council would love for you to show your Central Spirit next week.
Monday, April 20th- HOME run! - wear sports attire
Tuesday, April 21st- HOME away from home- dress up in clothes from your favorite vacation spot
Wednesday, April 22nd- HOMiEs- dress the same as a friend or family (send in family photos)
Thursday, April 23rd- There’s no place like HOME- orange and black #WashingtonStrong
STUCO will also be giving $1600 to local businesses to support our hometown. #supportlocal
#celebratecentral51 view image
2nd grade Remote Learning Enrichment Project: Rockets! 🚀 Savanna R. and Philip G, nice work! view image

Kindergarten Registration is still open! Please register your Kindergartner. Screening dates will be communicated at a later time. https://skyward.iscorp.com/scripts/wsisa.dll/WService=wseducentral51il/skyenroll.w

p.strong: Governor Pritzker has extended the "stay at home" order for all Illinois residents. As a result, all Central School District 51 buildings and offices will be closed through the end of the school year. Student attendance days will be conducted via Remote Learning during this time. Teachers and staff members will be responding to email. For a list of staff email addresses, please click here.
For all District Office communication on Remote Learning Days, please click here.
To continue to the website, please close this box using the x at the top, right side.
